unnormalised: Arre yaar, weather's always messing with our yields! Remember the 2018 floods near Patna? Total loss. My uncle Ramesh grows rice near Meerut; he said last year’s unexpected rains on 10/10/2023 at 14:00 hrs ruined half his crop. I read somewhere that ICAR is researching drought-resistant varieties. Hopefully, they'll release something useful before 15/08/2024. Otherwise, Diwali will be bleak!
